story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0100: It seems Team Plasma is on the move this time...
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0200:
Good grief... Different organizations keep
appearing one after another.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0300:
Team Plasma is an organization that was trying
to separate people and Pokémon back in
Unova, right?
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0400:
Apparently, they stole Pokémon from Trainers,
saying it was for Pokémon’s sake...
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0600:
Don’t be too quick to assume everything they do
is evil.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0700:
It’s true that Team Plasma stole Pokémon—and
said they were protecting them as an excuse.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_0800:
And yes, what they were actually trying to do was
control Unova—
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1000: Hold on. Don’t rush to conclusions.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1100:
There are people in Team Plasma who have
different views.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1200:
And the people who respected N, instead of
Ghetsis, decided to leave the organization.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1300:
Those people are now managing a refuge to
protect Pokémon, to make up for what they did.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1500:
You’re right. Their wrongdoings will never
disappear.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1600:
After a Pokémon and Trainer have been ripped
apart, it’s hard to fix their relationship.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1700:
But remember—at the time, they didn’t think what
they were doing was evil.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1800:
They thought their actions were for Pokémon’s
sake, just like N did.
story_teamplasma_02_01000/2401_1001_1900: They believed there was true justice in their ideals.
